title: Aqidah
accomplishments: Learned about tawhid, risalah, ma'ad, and sirah
Understood the importance of akidah in daily life
Gained confidence and discipline through understanding and practicing akidah

title: Fiqih
accomplishments: Studied various aspects of fiqh including ibadah, muamalah, and ethics
Applied fiqh principles in daily practices
Participated in discussions and case studies on contemporary fiqh issues

title: Faraidh
accomplishments: Learned and applied the principles of inheritance and bequest in Islamic law
Understood the differences between Sunni and Shia schools of thought on the matter
Participated in discussions and debates on the application of Faraidh in contemporary society
